content:
AHARYA COSTUMES &
DANCE NEEDS
Choose from a range of over
 100 Bharathanatyam and
 Semi Classical costumes & accessories
for different age groups
Location: Bangalore

How to choose : 
A. You can visit Natanam Foundation, Horamavu
(Bangalore) and choose your costumes
B. Send a picture of the dancer 
and get the costume delivered to your place 
 Reach us at +91 9483614108 / 9449764782 
for further details and bookings
